concept.title: User Guide
concept.shortdesc: This User Guide instructs you how to use a Eucalyptus private cloud. As a cloud user, you will set up your account, work with images, launch instances, and so on. To install or administer and operate a Eucalyptus cloud, refer to the Eucalyptus Installation Guide and the Administration Guide, respectively.

conbody.p: Enjoy using your Eucalyptus private cloud!
